attributes.action: Introduce a target rate for RPI as well as CPI
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As RPI is an important indicator of inflation I would like to see a target rate added for this.

This would mean that interest rates and other BoE decisions would have to be made to ensure that this is kept in target range as much as CPI.  

This may also help contains overgrowth in housing prices going forward removing a driver for boom and bust
